message: """"Just ignorant stupid liberals won't hear* any of it."""" That's better. Your dismissal of Hillary still doesn't address the fact that Trump is continuing to surround himself with the elite and wealthy. The same persons who use loopholes to avoid contributing taxes to our government, who happily send jobs overseas to improve their bottom line but not the life of citizens in the U.S.. How is Trump going to help make our country better when the people he's working with are practiced at only making the lives of their fellow elite members better first? Trickle down economics doesnt work.

""""God...your a smart dude..wow!"""" (I probably just seem that way relative to you.) My real point is I'm saying you should listen to the guys who ARE smart dudes... the PhD's in the field. (I asked you where the """"real scientists"""" you mentioned work.) I mean, isn't it odd that you can't find a single actual scientific organization that agrees with you? Surely you can find at least ONE. Otherwise, you're saying every scientific organization on Earth disagrees with you on this, a science issue. Despite your """"real scientists that says the ice mass is growing"""" comment. (Still waiting for your evidence on that one!)
